mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task_vo (task_number, task_title, task_startDate, task_endDate, user_id, bigGoal_number, smallGoal_number) VALUES (task_seq.NEXTVAL, #{task_title}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{task_startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF1'), TO_TIMESTAMP(#{task_endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF1'), #{user_id}, #{bigGoal_number}, #{smallGoal_number})
mapper.select: SELECT task_number, task_name, task_startDate, task_endDate, bigGoal_number, smallGoal_number FROM task_vo WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
